sources.title: Forty Thieves
sources.description: Title: Forty Thieves Summary: When he runs for sheriff, Hoppy is beaten by Jerry Doyle, the gutless wonder voted for by every crook in town. When Hoppy moves to have the new sheriff impeached, outlaw leader Tad Hammond ... Directed by: Lesley Selander Actors: William Boyd, Andy Clyde, Jimmy Rogers Production Company: Harry Sherman Productions Release Date: 23 June 1944 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When he runs for sheriff, Hoppy is beaten by Jerry Doyle, the gutless wonder voted for by every crook in town. When Hoppy moves to have the new sheriff impeached, outlaw leader Tad Hammond hires forty gunslingers to stop him. Stop Hoppy? Hah!

metadata.Plot: When he runs for sheriff, Hoppy is beaten by Jerry Doyle, the gutless wonder voted for by every crook in town. When Hoppy moves to have the new sheriff impeached, outlaw leader Tad Hammond hires forty gunslingers to stop him. Stop Hoppy? Hah!
metadata.Writer: Michael Wilson, Bernie Kamins, Clarence E. Mulford
metadata.Actors: William Boyd, Andy Clyde, Jimmy Rogers
